thread.title: Angela Bassett on kissing Lady Gaga in American Horror Story: Hotel
thread.title_full: Angela Bassett on kissing Lady Gaga in American Horror Story: Hotel | DailyTelegraph

author: Colin Vickery
title: Angela Bassett on kissing Lady Gaga in American Horror Story: Hotel
text:
ACTORS step into the unknown when they sign on for American Horror Story.
Just ask Angela Bassett who has starred in three series of creators Ryan Murphy and Brad Falchuk â€™s ( Glee ) anthology horror series.
In American Horror Story: Coven , Bassett played real life 19th century voodoo queen Marie Laveau.
Welcome to the Hotel Cortez and cast of the new series American Horror Story: Hotel. Picture: Supplied
Lady Gaga Gets Upstaged At American Horror Story Premiere 1:06 Lady Gaga was joined by her boyfriend Taylor Kinney at the premiere of American Horror Story hotel. The singer was upstaged by one of her cast mates, Denis O'Hare, who made a statement with bright lipstick and large earrings. Gaga wore her long blonde hair in Hollywood waves and coordinated her red lipstick with an eye catching dress, Taylor was equally camera ready. The series will follow a string of grizzly murders at Hotel Cortez where Gaga plays the owner. Super model Naomi Campbell also appears in the series as a fashion editor that clashes with Gaga.
October 5th 2015 2 days ago /video/video.news.com.au/Entertainment/ Lady Gaga Gets Upstaged At American Horror Story Premiere
Lady Gaga was joined by her boyfriend Taylor Kinney at the premiere of American Horror Story hotel. The singer was upstaged by one of her cast mates, Denis O'Hare, who made a statement with bright lipstick and large earrings. Gaga wore her long blonde hair in Hollywood waves and coordinated her red lipstick with an eye catching dress, Taylor was equally camera ready. The series will follow a string of grizzly murders at Hotel Cortez where Gaga plays the owner. Super model Naomi Campbell also appears in the series as a fashion editor that clashes with Gaga.
Lady Gaga arrives at the premiere screening of FX's American Horror Story: Hotel in Los Angeles on October 3. Picture: Kevin Winter / Getty Images
Matt Bomer cuts a dashing look at the premiere screening of American Horror Story: Hotel.
Naomi Campbell also stars in the new series. Pictures: Reuters / Mario Anzuoni
Series creator Ryan Murphy (centre) poses with the cast (from left) Cheyenne Jackson, Kathy Bates, Sarah Paulson, Finn Wittrock, Naomi Campbell, Lady Gaga, Angela Bassett, Max Greenfield, Evan Peters, Denis O'Hare, Chloe Sevigny and Matt Bomer. Pictures: Reuters / Mario Anzuoni
